items.sentence: I want to go to heaven, but I don't want to die in order to get there.
I wonder whether a person can live on only two hours of sleep a night.
I'd like to buy this watch, but unfortunately it's just too expensive.
In this day and age, one doesn't have enough time to read long novels.
Tom and Mary tried to get as far away from civilization as they could.
The garbage that was left in the kitchen of the abandoned house stank.
This problem is too difficult for elementary school children to solve.
Tom took some money out of his pocket and gave it to the homeless man.
Tom doesn't come around anymore. Maybe he's moved to a different city.
Tom said he thought that he wouldn't enjoy going to Australia with me.
